# Metrics Dashboard Designer: PetPulse

**Generated by:** StratArts Metrics Dashboard Designer
**Date:** December 2025
**Business:** PetPulse - Smart Pet Health Monitoring

---

## Executive Summary

PetPulse's metrics framework uses the Pirate Metrics (AARRR) model to track customer journey from acquisition through revenue. This dashboard design provides real-time visibility into business health, enables data-driven decisions, and creates alignment across teams through shared KPIs.

**Framework:** Pirate Metrics (AARRR) + North Star Metric
**North Star:** Active Subscribers (subscription customers engaged in last 30 days)
**Update Frequency:** Real-time (key metrics), Daily (full dashboard), Weekly (deep analysis)

---

## North Star Metric

### Defining the North Star

**North Star Metric: Active Subscribers**

| Component | Definition |
|-----------|------------|
| Metric | Number of subscription customers who have opened the app in the last 30 days |
| Why | Captures both acquisition (subscriber) and engagement (active) |
| Leading indicator | Active subscribers correlate with retention and revenue |
| Team alignment | All teams can impact this metric |

### North Star Formula

```
Active Subscribers = Total Subscribers × 30-Day Active Rate

Example:
7,000 subscribers × 85% active = 5,950 Active Subscribers
```

### Supporting Metrics

| Supporting Metric | Impact on North Star |
|-------------------|---------------------|
| New subscribers | Increases total subscribers |
| Activation rate | Increases active % |
| Engagement frequency | Maintains active % |
| Churn rate | Decreases total subscribers |

---

## Pirate Metrics Framework (AARRR)

### Framework Overview

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                    PIRATE METRICS (AARRR)                       │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                                 │
│  ACQUISITION ──▶ ACTIVATION ──▶ RETENTION ──▶ REFERRAL ──▶ REVENUE│
│                                                                 │
│  How do users   Do they have   Do they      Do they      Do they │
│  find us?       a great first  come back?   tell others? pay us? │
│                 experience?                                      │
│                                                                 │
│  Website        Collar setup   Weekly       Referral     MRR    │
│  visits         + first        engagement   rate         LTV    │
│                 alert                                           │
│                                                                 │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

---

## Acquisition Metrics

### Key Metrics

| Metric | Definition | Target | Alert |
|--------|------------|--------|-------|
| **Website Visitors** | Unique visitors/month | 100K | <50K |
| **Traffic by Source** | Breakdown by channel | Diversified | >50% any single |
| **CAC** | Total spend / New customers | <$100 | >$150 |
| **CAC by Channel** | Spend per channel / Customers | Varies | Outliers |
| **Conversion Rate** | Purchases / Visitors | 2% | <1% |
| **Cost Per Click** | Ad spend / Clicks | <$2 | >$3 |
| **Cost Per Lead** | Spend / Email signups | <$5 | >$10 |

### Acquisition Dashboard

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  ACQUISITION DASHBOARD                      Period: Last 30 Days│
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                                 │
│  TRAFFIC OVERVIEW                                               │
│  ┌─────────────┬─────────────┬─────────────┬─────────────┐      │
│  │   85,420    │   2.1%      │   1,794     │   $78       │      │
│  │   Visitors  │   Conv Rate │   Purchases │   CAC       │      │
│  │   ↑12%      │   ↑0.2%     │   ↑15%      │   ↓$8       │      │
│  └─────────────┴─────────────┴─────────────┴─────────────┘      │
│                                                                 │
│  TRAFFIC BY SOURCE                                              │
│  ├── Paid Social    35%  ████████████                           │
│  ├── Organic Search 25%  ████████                               │
│  ├── Direct         20%  ██████                                 │
│  ├── Referral       12%  ████                                   │
│  └── Email          8%   ███                                    │
│                                                                 │
│  CAC BY CHANNEL                                                 │
│  ├── Vet Partners   $45  ████                                   │
│  ├── Referral       $32  ███                                    │
│  ├── Organic        $35  ███                                    │
│  ├── Paid Social    $92  █████████                              │
│  └── Influencer     $78  ███████                                │
│                                                                 │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

### Acquisition Formulas

| Metric | Formula |
|--------|---------|
| CAC | Total Marketing Spend / New Customers |
| Conversion Rate | (Purchases / Website Visitors) × 100 |
| ROAS | Revenue from Ads / Ad Spend |
| CPC | Ad Spend / Total Clicks |
| CPL | Lead Gen Spend / New Leads |

---

## Activation Metrics

### Key Metrics

| Metric | Definition | Target | Alert |
|--------|------------|--------|-------|
| **Setup Completion** | % completing collar setup | 90% | <80% |
| **Time to Setup** | Hours from delivery to setup | <24h | >48h |
| **First Alert Received** | % receiving first alert within 7 days | 70% | <50% |
| **App Opens (Day 1)** | % opening app on day 1 | 95% | <85% |
| **App Opens (Day 7)** | % opening app on day 7 | 80% | <70% |
| **Telehealth Used** | % using telehealth in first 30 days | 40% | <25% |

### Activation Dashboard

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  ACTIVATION DASHBOARD                       Period: Last 30 Days│
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                                 │
│  SETUP FUNNEL                                                   │
│  ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐    │
│  │ Delivered → Setup Started → Setup Complete → First Alert│    │
│  │   1,794      1,706 (95%)     1,615 (90%)    1,131 (63%) │    │
│  └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘    │
│                                                                 │
│  ACTIVATION METRICS                                             │
│  ┌─────────────┬─────────────┬─────────────┬─────────────┐      │
│  │   90%       │   18 hrs    │   63%       │   42%       │      │
│  │   Setup     │   Avg Time  │   First     │   Telehealth│      │
│  │   Complete  │   to Setup  │   Alert     │   Used      │      │
│  │   ↑2%       │   ↓3 hrs    │   ↑5%       │   ↑8%       │      │
│  └─────────────┴─────────────┴─────────────┴─────────────┘      │
│                                                                 │
│  DAY 7 APP ENGAGEMENT                                           │
│  ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐    │
│  │ ███████████████████████████████████████░░░░░░░░░  82%   │    │
│  │ Target: 80%                                              │    │
│  └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘    │
│                                                                 │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

### Activation Formulas

| Metric | Formula |
|--------|---------|
| Setup Completion | (Setups Complete / Collars Delivered) × 100 |
| Day N Activation | (Users Active on Day N / Users Acquired N Days Ago) × 100 |
| Aha Moment Rate | (Users Reaching Aha Moment / New Users) × 100 |

### "Aha Moment" Definition

**PetPulse Aha Moment:** User receives their first health alert OR uses telehealth within 7 days

Users who reach the Aha Moment retain at 85%+ vs. 60% for those who don't.

---

## Retention Metrics

### Key Metrics

| Metric | Definition | Target | Alert |
|--------|------------|--------|-------|
| **DAU/MAU** | Daily Active / Monthly Active | 40% | <30% |
| **WAU** | Weekly Active Users | 70% | <60% |
| **D7 Retention** | % active on day 7 | 80% | <70% |
| **D30 Retention** | % active on day 30 | 70% | <60% |
| **Monthly Churn** | % subscribers cancelling | <5% | >8% |
| **Annual Retention** | % retained after 12 months | 65% | <55% |

### Retention Dashboard

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  RETENTION DASHBOARD                        Period: Last 30 Days│
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                                 │
│  ENGAGEMENT OVERVIEW                                            │
│  ┌─────────────┬─────────────┬─────────────┬─────────────┐      │
│  │   5,950     │   42%       │   4.2%      │   $456      │      │
│  │   Active    │   DAU/MAU   │   Monthly   │   Avg LTV   │      │
│  │   Subs      │             │   Churn     │             │      │
│  │   ↑8%       │   ↑3%       │   ↓0.5%     │   ↑$24      │      │
│  └─────────────┴─────────────┴─────────────┴─────────────┘      │
│                                                                 │
│  RETENTION CURVE                                                │
│  100%│●                                                         │
│   90%│ ●                                                        │
│   80%│  ●●                                                      │
│   70%│    ●●●●                                                  │
│   60%│        ●●●●●●●●                                          │
│   50%│                ●●●●●●●●●●●●                              │
│      └─────────────────────────────────────                     │
│        D1  D7  D14 D30    D60    D90                            │
│                                                                 │
│  COHORT ANALYSIS (Last 6 Months)                                │
│         Week1  Week2  Week3  Week4  Month2 Month3               │
│  Jun    85%    78%    72%    70%    65%    62%                  │
│  Jul    87%    80%    75%    72%    68%    65%                  │
│  Aug    88%    82%    77%    74%    70%    67%                  │
│  Sep    89%    83%    78%    75%    71%    -                    │
│  Oct    90%    84%    79%    76%    -      -                    │
│  Nov    91%    85%    80%    -      -      -                    │
│                                                                 │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

### Retention Formulas

| Metric | Formula |
|--------|---------|
| D(N) Retention | (Users Active Day N / Users Acquired Day 0) × 100 |
| Monthly Churn | (Cancelled Subscribers / Start of Month Subscribers) × 100 |
| DAU/MAU | (Daily Active Users / Monthly Active Users) × 100 |
| Net Revenue Retention | (MRR End + Expansion - Churn) / MRR Start × 100 |

### Cohort Analysis Template

Track retention by acquisition month to identify trends and issues.

---

## Referral Metrics

### Key Metrics

| Metric | Definition | Target | Alert |
|--------|------------|--------|-------|
| **Referral Rate** | % customers who refer | 15% | <10% |
| **Referral Conversion** | % referred visitors who purchase | 30% | <20% |
| **K-Factor** | Viral coefficient | 0.15 | <0.1 |
| **NPS** | Net Promoter Score | 60+ | <50 |
| **Reviews Generated** | App store reviews/month | 50 | <25 |

### Referral Dashboard

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  REFERRAL DASHBOARD                         Period: Last 30 Days│
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                                 │
│  REFERRAL OVERVIEW                                              │
│  ┌─────────────┬─────────────┬─────────────┬─────────────┐      │
│  │   14.2%     │   28%       │   0.12      │   58        │      │
│  │   Referral  │   Referred  │   K-Factor  │   NPS       │      │
│  │   Rate      │   Conv Rate │             │   Score     │      │
│  │   ↑1.2%     │   ↓2%       │   ↑0.02     │   ↑3        │      │
│  └─────────────┴─────────────┴─────────────┴─────────────┘      │
│                                                                 │
│  REFERRAL FUNNEL                                                │
│  Customers → Shared Code → Clicks → Purchases                   │
│    7,000      994 (14%)    2,982    835 (28%)                   │
│                                                                 │
│  NPS DISTRIBUTION                                               │
│  Promoters (9-10)    ████████████████████████  62%              │
│  Passives (7-8)      ████████████  28%                          │
│  Detractors (0-6)    ████  10%                                  │
│                                                                 │
│  TOP REFERRERS (This Month)                                     │
│  1. Sarah M.    15 referrals   $450 earned                      │
│  2. Mike T.     12 referrals   $360 earned                      │
│  3. Lisa K.     10 referrals   $300 earned                      │
│                                                                 │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

### Referral Formulas

| Metric | Formula |
|--------|---------|
| Referral Rate | (Customers Who Referred / Total Customers) × 100 |
| K-Factor | Referral Rate × Referred Conversion Rate |
| NPS | % Promoters - % Detractors |
| Referral CAC | Referral Costs / Referred Customers |

---

## Revenue Metrics

### Key Metrics

| Metric | Definition | Target | Alert |
|--------|------------|--------|-------|
| **MRR** | Monthly Recurring Revenue | Growth | Decline |
| **ARR** | Annual Recurring Revenue | $2M Y1 | Below plan |
| **ARPU** | Average Revenue Per User | $29 | <$25 |
| **LTV** | Lifetime Value | $450 | <$350 |
| **LTV:CAC** | LTV to CAC ratio | 4.5:1 | <3:1 |
| **Gross Margin** | (Revenue - COGS) / Revenue | 70% | <60% |

### Revenue Dashboard

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  REVENUE DASHBOARD                          Period: Last 30 Days│
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                                 │
│  REVENUE OVERVIEW                                               │
│  ┌─────────────┬─────────────┬─────────────┬─────────────┐      │
│  │   $203K     │   $2.4M     │   $29       │   4.8:1     │      │
│  │   MRR       │   ARR       │   ARPU      │   LTV:CAC   │      │
│  │   ↑12%      │   ↑12%      │   -         │   ↑0.3      │      │
│  └─────────────┴─────────────┴─────────────┴─────────────┘      │
│                                                                 │
│  MRR MOVEMENT                                                   │
│  ┌──────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐       │
│  │ Starting MRR              $181,000                   │       │
│  │ + New MRR                 + $52,026                  │       │
│  │ + Expansion MRR           + $2,100                   │       │
│  │ - Churn MRR               - $8,126                   │       │
│  │ - Contraction MRR         - $1,000                   │       │
│  │ = Ending MRR              $226,000                   │       │
│  └──────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘       │
│                                                                 │
│  MRR GROWTH (Last 6 Months)                                     │
│  $250K│                                         ●               │
│  $200K│                               ●                         │
│  $150K│                     ●                                   │
│  $100K│           ●                                             │
│   $50K│  ●                                                      │
│       └─────────────────────────────────────                    │
│         Jul   Aug   Sep   Oct   Nov   Dec                       │
│                                                                 │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

### Revenue Formulas

| Metric | Formula |
|--------|---------|
| MRR | Σ (Active Subscribers × Monthly Price) |
| ARR | MRR × 12 |
| ARPU | MRR / Active Subscribers |
| LTV | ARPU × Avg Customer Lifespan (months) |
| LTV:CAC | LTV / CAC |
| Gross Margin | (Revenue - COGS) / Revenue × 100 |

---

---

## Implementation Guide

### Data Infrastructure

| Layer | Tool | Purpose |
|-------|------|---------|
| Collection | Segment, Mixpanel | Event tracking |
| Storage | PostgreSQL, BigQuery | Data warehouse |
| Processing | dbt, Fivetran | Data transformation |
| Visualization | Metabase, Looker | Dashboards |
| Alerting | Slack, Email | Notifications |

### Event Tracking Plan

| Event | Properties | AARRR Stage |
|-------|------------|-------------|
| page_viewed | url, source | Acquisition |
| signup_started | source, campaign | Acquisition |
| purchase_completed | product, price, source | Acquisition |
| collar_setup_started | user_id | Activation |
| collar_setup_completed | user_id, time_to_setup | Activation |
| alert_received | user_id, alert_type | Activation |
| app_opened | user_id, session_count | Retention |
| telehealth_started | user_id | Retention |
| referral_sent | user_id, channel | Referral |
| referral_converted | referrer_id, referee_id | Referral |
| subscription_started | user_id, plan, price | Revenue |
| subscription_cancelled | user_id, reason | Revenue |

### Dashboard Access

| Dashboard | Audience | Refresh |
|-----------|----------|---------|
| Executive | Leadership | Daily |
| Acquisition | Marketing | Real-time |
| Product | Product team | Daily |
| Revenue | Finance | Daily |
| Support | Support team | Real-time |

---

## Reporting Cadence

### Daily Standup Metrics

- North Star (Active Subscribers)
- New subscriptions
- Churn (if any)
- Support tickets

### Weekly Report

- Full AARRR breakdown
- Week-over-week changes
- Key wins and concerns
- Focus for next week

### Monthly Deep Dive

- Cohort analysis
- Funnel conversion rates
- Channel performance
- LTV:CAC by cohort
- Competitive benchmarks

### Quarterly Business Review

- Goal progress
- Strategic adjustments
- Resource allocation
- Forecast updates

---

## Summary

### Metrics Framework

| Stage | Primary Metric | Target |
|-------|----------------|--------|
| North Star | Active Subscribers | 10,000 Y1 |
| Acquisition | CAC | <$100 |
| Activation | Setup Completion | 90% |
| Retention | Monthly Churn | <5% |
| Referral | Referral Rate | 15% |
| Revenue | MRR | $200K+ |

### Key Dashboards

1. Executive Dashboard (daily)
2. Acquisition Dashboard (real-time)
3. Retention Dashboard (daily)
4. Revenue Dashboard (daily)

### Success Criteria

- All targets met or exceeded
- Improving trends month-over-month
- LTV:CAC > 4:1 sustained
- NPS > 50

---

1. **Run:** `retention-optimization-expert` - Deep dive on retention
2. **Run:** `onboarding-flow-optimizer` - Improve activation
3. **Run:** `customer-feedback-framework` - Systematic feedback collection
